{{Infobox College Tennis Team |name = South Carolina Gamecocks |logo = South Carolina Gamecocks Block C logo.svg |logo_size = 100 |university = University of South Carolina |conference = Southeastern Conference |conference_short = SEC |division = East |city = Columbia |stateabb = SC |state = South Carolina |coach = Arlo Elkins |tenure = 26th |stadium = [[Maxcy Gregg Tennis Center]] |nickname = [[South Carolina Gamecocks|Gamecocks]] |color1 = Garnet |color2 = Black |color3 = |fontcolor = ffffff |hex1 = 8C2633 |hex2 = 000000 |hex3 = |NCAAchampion = |NCAArunnerup = |NCAAtourneys = 1982, 1983, 1988, 1990, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010 |conference_tournament = Metro Conference: 1985, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1990 |conference_season = }} The '''[[South Carolina Gamecocks]] women's [[tennis]] team''' represents the [[University of South Carolina]] and competes in the [[Southeastern Conference]]. The team has been coached by [[Arlo Elkins]] since 1984. ==Head coaches==
{| class="wikitable sortable" |+ ! Name ! Years ! Seasons ! Won ! Lost !
